SELECT ISSUE_ID , TASK_ID , ISSUE_TITLE , ISSUE_CTS , ISSUE_RGST_DATE , ISSUE_STUS_CODE , ITGRN_ATTACH_FILE_NUM , DELETE_YN , WRITER FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , ISSUE_ID , TASK_ID , ISSUE_TITLE , ISSUE_CTS , ISSUE_RGST_DATE , ISSUE_STUS_CODE , ITGRN_ATTACH_FILE_NUM , DELETE_YN , WRITER FROM( SELECT ISSUE_ID , TASK_ID , ISSUE_TITLE , ISSUE_CTS , ISSUE_RGST_DATE , ISSUE_STUS_CODE , ITGRN_ATTACH_FILE_NUM , DELETE_YN , WRITER FROM ISSUE ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(ISSUE_ID) DESC ) A ) WHERE RN > ( #{pageNum} - 1 ) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
